for Baldur's Gate 3.

Baldur's Gate 3 Editions

Baldur's Gate 3 Digital Deluxe Edition

The Digital Deluxe Edition of Baldur's Gate 3 includes Base Game content as well as some extra downloadable cosmetic content. This includes:

Bard Song Pack - Astound audiences by performing this special set of new songs Exclusive Dice Theme - Roll checks with style Paintings from Rivellon - Discover a new collection of paintings across the Forgotten Realms Adventurer's Pouch - Receive a collection of camp s
